title: *****Private Landlord in need for solid tenants - no BS  ****
posting_body: ['** CUSTOMER SERVICE ORIENTED LANDLORD - Being in the sales and service industry, I am a fair, flexible, customer-oriented, and easy-to-work-with landlord.', 'I know the value of treating customers (tenants) well and responding to their needs immediately (returning phone calls right away, taking care of business, and maintaining tenant satisfaction)', '**', 'WHAT DO I LOOK FOR - Assurance that rent will be paid on a timely, consistent fashion and that you are responsible, trustworthy, and low-maintenance.', 'Clean rental, credit and background.', ' I do not want to fly down from California to fix a clogged toilet or replace a battery in the smoke detector.', 'I will consider low credit with higher deposit', '** RENT – $2450 plus $50 sewer and garbage.', 'This immaculate former model home was used by the builder to show buyers what the builder had to offer.', 'This highly upgraded remodeled Southwest beauty is available for move-in!!This property is not the average investor rental base model and one that tenants can appreciate.', '** PRIME LOCATION – Conveniently located 1 mile from 24-hour Super Walmart, Lowes, Office Depot, Ross, over a dozen restaurants, Bank of America, Starbucks, gas stations, and many more retail establishments.', 'Also 15 minutes from Strip and McCarran Airport and 2 blocks from Southern Hills hospital.', '** BEDROOMS - 3 bedrooms and 2.5 baths and spacious loft', '**SPACIOUS FLOOR PLAN –', 'This approximately 2500 sq house has a large size family room and the loft upstairs can be used as an office, bonus room, or storage area.', '** UPGRADES -', 'This house has all of the bells and whistles including new quartz countertops with oak cabinets, custom paint, custom front and back yards, upgraded carpet, master deluxe bath with his/her sinks, huge walk in master closet, new stainless steel dishwasher, new oven, new microwave, new fridge, new toilet, new kitchen sinks and new curtains.', 'Text Stanley at', 'show contact info']
